title: [BUG] <title> DrawPath cause Memory Leak on GPU context
body:
### Description

I have wrote a program could switch to run in GPU context or  CPU context， when in CPU context, the memory usage is constant, but in GPU context, memory increase linearly. Finally, when I commented  the canvas.DrawPath code line, the memory usage is constant again.

### Code

The best way to share code for larger projects is a link to a GitHub repository: https://github.com/user/repo/tree/bug-123

But, you can also share a short block of code here:
```cs
// some C# code here
using (var paintFill = new SKPaint { IsAntialias = true })
{
        paintFill.StrokeWidth = 0;
        paintFill.Style = SKPaintStyle.Fill;
        paintFill.PathEffect = null;
        paintFill.Shader = null;
        paintFill.Color = fillColor.ToSkia(opacity);
        canvas.DrawPath(path, paintFill); //this line cause memory leak in GPU context
}
